watch.loading.loading_icon_spinner=spinner.gif watch.rssreaderpath=/xwiki watch.productname=XWiki Watch watch.introduction=Welcome to XWiki Watch ! XWiki Watch will allow you to track information about your company or the subject that your are interested in in Real Time. It will also allow you to collaboratively comment and tag interesting information to share it with your co-workers. watch.spacesavailable=Watch Spaces available watch.administration=Administration
